content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, the standard price for this apartment is €850 per month. But since it's a newly built unfurnished apartment, I could start with €800.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am asking for the price of €850 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I could offer €840. It's a good price for such a central location.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am asking for the price of €850 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, €850 it is. I can offer a long-term contract.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [850] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great, we have a deal. Let's sign the lease.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
